dataset_id: BOREAS Follow-On DSP-10 Regridded Peatland Maps
title: BOREAS Follow-On DSP-10 Regridded Peatland Maps
summary: These images were produced by aggregating 1' gridded data layers derived from the polygon-based Peatlands of Canada Database (Tarnocai et al., 2000) to 10' (horizontal) by 5' (vertical) and to 0.5 degree by 0.5 degree (or 30' by 30') pixel sizes in straight latitude/longitude grids.

cmr.title: BOREAS Follow-On DSP-10 Regridded Peatland Maps
cmr.summary: These images were produced by aggregating 1' gridded data layers derived from the polygon-based Peatlands of Canada Database (Tarnocai et al., 2000) to 10' (horizontal) by 5' (vertical) and to 0.5 degree by 0.5 degree (or 30' by 30') pixel sizes in straight latitude/longitude grids.
cmr.description: These images were produced by aggregating 1' gridded data layers derived from the polygon-based Peatlands of Canada Database (Tarnocai et al., 2000) to 10' (horizontal) by 5' (vertical) and to 0.5 degree by 0.5 degree (or 30' by 30') pixel sizes in straight latitude/longitude grids.

citation: Turquety, S., J.A. Logan, D.J. Jacob, R.C. Hudman, F.Y. Leung, C.L. Heald, R.M. Yantosca, S. Wu, L.K. Emmons, D.P. Edwards, and G.W. Sachse. 2007. Inventory of boreal fire emissions for North America in 2004: Importance of peat burning and pyroconvective injection. Journal of Geophysical Research. 112(D12):
